snippet.title: Have a Pet? Forever....
snippet.description: Oh boy... Looks like Kobal made a new friend. Regardless if he wanted it or not. Look forward to meeting YOUR friend ingame - in a patch near you! - Find out more about the followers in the upcoming days!
